name: Herding Cats: The 400th South Winchester Jr. Semi-Finals with Fiona Pennywhistle
name_original: Herding Cats: The 400th South Winchester Jr. Semi-Finals with Fiona Pennywhistle
description:
Mac Users!: May only work in Firefox
Made For Ludum Dare 40

Play as Fiona Pennywhistle and try to take Jane Cavendish's place as Semi-Finalist Cat Herding Champion. If only the little buggers would go where you told them. Keep playing to unlock more narration!

Controls: Arrow Keys
